_comment: bench-03: Directive hazard test. Precision test for risk isolation between safe controller and MANUAL directives.
notes: SafeController has no watch/compile — must be SAFE despite dangerous directives in same file
modalDirective uses compile() AND transclude — double MANUAL signal

Engine currently does not emit changes for directives directly — they appear as behaviors
If engine flags SafeController as MANUAL it is a false positive
